alert.note: Alert for Clay; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 6:39AM MDT until May 11 at 7:30AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 739 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Irene, or 16 miles northeast of Yankton, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Viborg around 750 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hurley, Davis, Parker, Chancellor, Marion and Monroe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
